span.p:
Redis
Short-term Episodic Cache
Task Queue, Review Queue
Daily Spend Counters

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PostgreSQL
Campaign Configs
Agent Metadata (JSONB)
Wallet Tx Logs (ACID)
High-velocity counters (via TimescaleDB ext?)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Weaviate Vector DB
Persona Evolution
Trend Clusters
Semantic Memories
RAG Retrieval

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
On-chain Ledger
(Base/Ethereum/Solana via Coinbase AgentKit)
Immutable Tx Record
Wallet Balances (get_balance)
